definition: lit. to breathe through the same nostril (idiom); fig. two people say exactly the same thing (usually derog.)/to sing from the same hymn sheet

sentences.english: These patients are told to blink their eyes and to respire through their noses.
sentences.chinese: 八位患者并告之以眨眼动作，并由鼻孔呼吸。

sentences.english: Pepper tickles if it gets into the nose.
sentences.chinese: 胡椒进入鼻孔会使人发痒。

sentences.english: Picking your nose is a repulsive habit.
sentences.chinese: 挖鼻孔这种习惯很讨厌。

sentences.english: Does not have detachable pieces that can lodge in the windpipe, ears, or nostrils.
sentences.chinese: 没有可拆卸的片断，可以向在气管，耳朵，或鼻孔。

sentences.english: It's not nice to pick your nose.
SCIENTISTS in Canada have found that picking your NOSE and eating it could be good for your health.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大科学家发现挖鼻孔并吃鼻屎有助于你的健康。

sentences.english: Second and significantly, God himself blows the breath of life into Adam's nostrils.
sentences.chinese: 第二重要的，上帝将生命之气吹进亚当的鼻孔。

sentences.english: She walks past us dawn her nose in the waterdrop.
sentences.chinese: 她从咱们身旁走过，神气得鼻孔朝天。

sentences.english: The real nose however is the blowhole on top of the head.
sentences.chinese: 而真正的鼻孔其实是它们头顶的喷水孔。

sentences.english: Blow on the nose and nose picking may be the direct cause of bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 用力擤鼻子和用手指挖鼻孔可能是鼻出血的直接原因。

sentences.english: Turns out, he went digging for treasure up his nose earlier. I found the treasure in my mouth.
sentences.chinese: 原来他刚才在挖鼻孔，然后鼻屎现在到了我嘴里。

sentences.english: The odor of disinfectant stung my nostrils as I moved down the row of pens.
sentences.chinese: 下楼梯时消毒水的味道冲刺着我的鼻孔。

sentences.english: After blowing your nose, insert the tip of the nasal spray container into your nostril and spray it one or twice.
sentences.chinese: 擤尽鼻涕后将喷雾瓶的喷头伸入鼻孔内，喷一到两次。

sentences.english: These traces no more can be hidden than one'; s nose, looking heavenward.
sentences.chinese: 总是深山更深处，了天鼻孔怎藏他？

definition: the wing of the nose/ala nasi
mouth/CL:張|张[zhang1]/slap in the face/CL:個|个[ge4]
tongue/CL:個|个[ge4]/enemy soldier captured for the purpose of extracting information
